Hamcrest Matcher Library for JSON Objects (org.json)
= Introduction =

Pages and pages of unit tests for verification of JSONObjects and inclination of using Hamcrest matchers have resulted in this.

= Details =
  # [hasKeyMatcher]
  # [hasPathMatcher]

== Dependencies ==
  # [http://hamcrest.googlecode.com/files/hamcrest-all-1.1.jar hamcrest-all v1.1]
{{{
    <dependency>
          <groupId>org.hamcrest</groupId>
          <artifactId>hamcrest-all</artifactId>
          <version>1.1</version>
    </dependency>
}}}
  # [http://guava-libraries.googlecode.com/files/guava-r09.zip google guava r09]
{{{
    <dependency>
          <groupId>com.google.guava</groupId>
          <artifactId>guava</artifactId>
          <version>r09</version>
    </dependency>
}}}
  # org.json 20090211
{{{
    <dependency>
          <groupId>org.json</groupId>
          <artifactId>json</artifactId>
          <version>20090211</version>
    </dependency>
}}}
  # junit 4.8.2 (tests only)
{{{
    <dependency>
      <groupId>junit</groupId>
      <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
      <version>4.8.2</version>
      <scope>test</scope>
    </dependency>
}}}
